title: Amid fourth wave fears, Karnataka to tighten measures at Kerala, Mahararshtra borders - Daijiworld.com
content:

description:
Vijayapura, Apr 27 (IANS): Karnataka government is all set to tighten measures at the Kerala and Maharashtra border check posts in view of fears about the fourth wave of Covid.
The borders with Kerala and Mahararshtra were closed at the peak of the second and third waves as it was found that the spread of infection du.....
